01-default-frame.title: Featured Card Frame
01-default-frame.description: A card frame with a curved top cutout for featured images or hero content.

02-tooltip-example.title: Tooltip Frame
02-tooltip-example.description: A frame with a pointer tail on the bottom, typical for tooltips or popovers.

03-sidebar-tab.title: Sidebar Tab Frame
03-sidebar-tab.description: A frame with a tab extending from the side, perfect for active navigation states.
